data.text: A small house for children to play in.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A child's toy house; a dollhouse.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A house appropriated to dramatic performances; a theater.
A building used for dramatic exhibitions; a theater.

data.text: A house for children to play in; a toyhouse.

data.text: A <xref>toy</xref> house for children to play in; a <xref>cubby house</xref> or <xref>Wendy house</xref>.

data.text: plaything consisting of a small model of a house that children can play inside of
